video_prompt: **Prompt:** A gigantic futuristic naval platform hovers, emitting swirling, crackling blue energy beams upwards and downwards. Modern battleships and traditional sailing ships fly and explode, firing fiery projectiles. Debris and abstract black cubes swirl, some near shifting blue portals. Turbulent blue sea churns below, as vessels are pulled and collide. Dramatic light flares punctuate the chaotic movement and destruction.
image_prompt: Fantastical epic naval battle in a cloudy sky: A gigantic, futuristic flying battleship, detailed with glowing blue and orange lights and "TIME AND SPACE JUDGMENT PLATFORM" inscribed, emits powerful, swirling blue energy beams crackling with lightning. Modern battleships and traditional sailing ships, some firing projectiles, are chaotically engaged in airborne combat within these beams. Floating black cubic debris and swirling blue portals add to the destruction above a turbulent blue sea. Dramatic lighting, explosions, and glowing energy.
refined_video_prompt: Hovering, a colossal form continuously emits swirling, crackling blue energy beams both upwards and downwards. Modern battleships and traditional sailing ships explosively fly and detonate, launching fiery projectiles. Debris and cubes constantly swirl, some moving towards and through shifting blue portals. The turbulent blue sea churns violently below, as vessels are pulled, dragged, and dynamically collide. Dramatic light flares punctuate the intense, chaotic destruction.
